Header.title: FLOWS
Header.paragraph: The Building Blocks of Reasoning and Collaborative AI

About.paragraph: Flows are modular building blocks that can be combined and composed into interactions of arbitrary complexity in an open-ended way. For example, prompting schemes, agent--agent, agent--tools, even human-agent interactions are special instances of flows that can be composed into more complex ones.
